It's FREAKING AMAZING. It is a super competitive game, you can get skins worth more than the game is actually worth, and there are modes when you aren't feeling super competitive so you don't get any penalties. If there was one thing I would change about this game, I would shorten the bans on competitive mode, so you only get banned for a 3 day max. Other than that, this is a great game, and cheap for how fun it is.

How to learn Russian:

2. Install CS:GO
3. Become level 3
4. Start a  competative match on Dust II
